name: The Beginning - PreAlpha
description:
This is the first release for the Pre-Alpha of "The Beginning" a Unity-Based crafting, post-apocalyptic survival game.  This is definitely the largest project I have ever worked on and just something I finally got in a playable state, so I figured I would release this and get some feedback, and maybe be able to raise some funds for future development. 

Any purchase here, or on our site, indietoken.net, will be updated regularly, and no one will have to purchase updated versions, DLC's, etc. One-time purchase means you get the rest of everything forever.
